title: Pixel 2XL Battery Bulging / Screen Bulging
content:
For the past couple of months, the down volume button has been finicky. It occasionally doesn't press down. Looking at the phone sideways, I noticed that the center of the phone's screen is a slightly raised in the center compared to the corners. Over the past few months, the gap has grown wider. I have looked into the issue and it seems to be a "swollen" battery from a Google Pixel 3 thread. In the thread, there were mentions that the battery must be replaced or it may be unsafe. Is this the case with the Google Pixel 2XL as well and can I quickly get a repair or replacement from Google?
2 photos are attached. One is the phone with the screen being pressed down. The other is the phone without the screen being pressed, showing the gap and distortion.
